Articles.Content: So, i recently installed procedural parts. the issue is that every 9 in 10 times when i am building a procedural tank it for some reason does let me change the shape. The shape slider does not even appear. this is very frustrating because i am stuck with the normal cylinder shape. please help me.
This would be best solved in the thread by the mod maker.  Also, you may want to grab the log from your KSP installation folder.
